mapper.select: select t1.store_code, t1.store_name, t1.store_phone, t1.store_address, t1.province, t1.city, t1.area from t_store_manage t1, t_client t2 where t1.is_delete = 0 and t1.invitation_code = t2.invitation_code and t2.user_code = #{userCode}
mapper.update: update t_store_manage set city =#{city}, area =#{area}, province =#{province}, store_name =#{storeName}, store_phone =#{storePhone}, store_address =#{storeAddress}, invitation_code =#{invitationCode}, user_code =#{userCode}, business_license =#{businessLicense}, gmt_modfied = now(), last_modfied_by = #{lastModfiedBy}, version = version + 1 where is_delete = 0 and store_code = #{storeCode} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select invitation_code from t_store_manage where is_delete = 0 and user_code = #{userCode}
select count(invitation_code) from t_store_manage where is_delete = 0 and invitation_code = #{invitationCode}
